results.name: Square array read by upward antidiagonals, A(n,k) = Sum_{j=0..n} (n-j)!*C(n,n-j)* C(n-1,n-j)*k^j, for n>=0 and k>=0.
link: Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
formula: A(n,k) = k*n!*hypergeom([1-n],[2],-k)) for n>=1 and 1 for n=0.
Row sums of triangle, Sum_{k=0..n} A(n-k, k) = 1 + A256325(n).
A(n, k) = k*(n-1)!*LaguerreL(n-1, 1, -k) with A(0, k) = 1.
T(n, k) = k*(n-k-1)!*LaguerreL(n-k-1, 1, -k) with T(n, n) = 1.
example: Triangle starts, T(n, k) = A(n-k, k):
maple: for n from 0 to 6 do lprint(seq(A(n,k), k=0..6)) od;
program: (PARI) {T(n, k) = if(n==0, 1, n!*sum(j=1, n, k^j*binomial(n-1, j-1)/j!))} \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Feb 03 2021
(Sage) flatten([[1 if k==n else k*factorial(n-k-1)*gen_laguerre(n-k-1, 1, -k) for k in (0..n)] for n in (0..12)]) # _G. C. Greubel_, Feb 23 2021
